abyss.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a very dangerous or frightening situation
abyss.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: At that time Bosnia was standing on the edge of an abyss.
The country might plunge into the abyss of economic ruin.
abyss.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a deep empty hole in the ground
abyss.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a very big difference that separates two people or groups
abyss.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: the gaping abyss between these grand buildings and my own miserable home
